contentfulBlogPost.title: 2023 Open Hardware Summit tickets are live!

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Hello wonderful open hardware creators and community members!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We are so excited to formally invite you to the 2023 Open Hardware Summit happening both in-person at NYU School of Law 40 Washington Square South New York, NY 10012 United States and online.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"You can grab your ticket today on Eventbrite at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.eventbrite.com/e/open-hardware-summit-2023-tickets-525062294457"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"https://www.eventbrite.com/e/open-hardware-summit-2023-tickets-525062294457","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This year we are offering a couple different ticket types including virtual, in-person, with a digital goodie bag (maybe you have enough stuff!!) or a physical goodie bag (maybe you want more stuff!!) as an add-on.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We canâ€™t wait to see you all both on and offline April 28th and 29th.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"OSHWA","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
